byline.contributor: Saba Imtiaz reported from Karachi, and Salman Masood from Islamabad. Zia ur-Rehman contributed reporting from Karachi.
byline.original: By SABA IMTIAZ and SALMAN MASOOD

lead_paragraph: Two officials with the Muttahida Qaumi Movement were arrested in the latest push by the Pakistani military to curb what it calls the party’s criminal activities.

headline.main: Pakistan Arrests Senior Officials of Karachi Political Party
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Arrests Top Officials of Karachi Political Party

snippet: Two officials with the Muttahida Qaumi Movement were arrested in the latest push by the Pakistani military to curb what it calls the party’s criminal activities.
